Text: (V:10 S:10) thanks juggs! movie was perfect quality, no problems. but guys!... i thought THIS MOVIE SUCKED! bad actors, the story was kind of dumb. it's just my opinion but use Your discretion. i was amped up for this but it really let me down =( juggs did his job well tho =P   take care all
